entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
